# Comparison with @magnetic/tag

### CDSTag.Selectable

| Props     | MDS | CDS  |
| --------- | --- | ---- |
| className | ✅  | ✅   |
| children  | ✅  | ✅   |
| prefix    | ✅  | ✅\* |
| size      | ✅  | ✅   |
| wrap      | ✅  | ✅   |
| selected  | ✅  | ✅   |

> 1 - The `prefix` prop is changed to `icon`.

### CDSTag.Overflow

| Props     | MDS | CDS |
| --------- | --- | --- |
| className | ✅  | ✅  |
| children  | ✅  | ✅  |
| tagCount  |     | ✅  |
